name: ProcGenLab
description:
Progress post for Demo Day 20!

Objects can be interacted with by looking at them and pressing E - the crosshair will turn green when you're close enough. Press Q to drop items from your hands. One of the terminals down the road can be used to go to a procedurally-generated maze.

There isn't really much actual gameplay to speak of; this is mostly just a progress post. Feedback and bug reports are still very appreciated though!

You can also follow development at my Twitter or Tumblr!
